mapper.select: select id, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, gender, age, tel, email, status, create_time, update_time, avatar_url from table_user where id = #{id} and status != -1
select id, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, gender, age, tel, email, status, create_time, update_time, avatar_url from myBlog.table_user where status != -1
mapper.insert: insert into table_user(user_name, pass_word, nick_name, gender, age, tel, email, create_time, update_time, avatar_url, update_by, create_by) values (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{avatar}, #{updateBy}, #{createBy})

insert into table_user(user_name, pass_word, nick_name, gender, age, tel, email, status, create_time, update_time, avatar_url) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.passWord}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.tel}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.avatarUrl})

insert into table_user(user_name, pass_word, nick_name, gender, age, tel, email, status, create_time, update_time, avatar_url) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.passWord}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.tel}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.avatarUrl})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name), pass_word = values(pass_word), nick_name = values(nick_name), gender = values(gender), age = values(age), tel = values(tel), email = values(email), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), avatar_url = values(avatar_url)
mapper.update:
update table_user
nick_name = #{nickName},
gender = #{sex},
age = #{age},
tel = #{phoneNumber},
email = #{email},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
avatar_url = #{avatar},
update_by = #{updateBy}
create_by = #{createBy}
where id = #{id}
